counter = 0
function trigger(onoff) if (onoff == 1) then counter = counter + 1 if (counter == 4) then draw_checkerboard_floor ("fl-abyss", "fl-sahara", 8, 17, 3, 3) set_floor("fl-sahara", 9,18) end else counter = counter - 1 if (counter == 3) then draw_checkerboard_floor ("fl-sahara", "fl-abyss", 8, 17, 3, 3) end end end
function showbridges(value, sender) for i = 1,bridgecount do SendMessage(enigma.GetNamedObject("bridge#"..i), "toggle", value) end end
